overview:
Curt Alpeter is the Senior Vice President of Sales at MyWebGrocer. Curt was most recently a Vice President at IDX Systems Corp., a publicly traded healthcare software company based in Burlington, Vermont. As a member of IDX’s Senior Operations Team, Curt was responsible for managing the sales, development and operational functions of IDX’s most strategic business partnership. During his 15 years at IDX, Curt also spent 10 years in a variety of sales leadership roles. As Vice President of Sales, Curt was responsible for leading a national team of 30 people including regional vice presidents, sales representatives, marketing and administrative staff.

via: MyWebGrocer
